error.notes: The trust did not notice that the spreadsheets contained hidden data that became visible by double-clicking the table

asset.notes: Following enumerations present before veris 1.3.3 removed: asset.governance.Personally owned.

confidentiality.notes: Spreadsheets were published containing confidential and sensitive personal data relating to 6,574 employees, including pay scale, National Insurance number, disabled status, ethnicity, religious belief and sexual orientation.

discovery_notes: The tables were accessed at least 59 times by 20 visitors while they were publicly available online and associated data was also downloaded by "persons unknown" on several occasions
notes: posted the private details of thousands of members of staff on its website
summary: Health trust fined after data breach - Blackpool Teaching Hospitals NHS Foundation Trust

victim.victim_id: Blackpool Teaching Hospitals NHS Foundation Trust
